name: Fulad-Zereh
description: The Fulad-Zereh is a huge fiend with an imposing presence, exhibiting features typical of demons. It bears a powerful build and armor, and its eyes hold a petrifying gaze, giving it a truly menacing appearance.
memorable: Its ability to instantly petrify creatures with its gaze and resist various damage types make it a uniquely dangerous foe.
goals: To exert control over its surroundings and defeat powerful adversaries through manipulation and brute strength.
relations: Might ally with lesser demons or chaos-themed creatures in the Abyss.
environment: Typically found in the depths of the Abyss or other chaotic locales.
strengths: High armor class and significant hit points, along with potent abilities like Petrifying Gaze and resistance to multiple damage types.
weaknesses: Lower Dexterity compared to its other attributes, making it less agile.
attacks: Utilizes a barbed whip to ensnare foes and a battleaxe for powerful melee strikes.
most_powerful_ability: Petrifying Gaze that can instantly petrify creatures within close range if they fail a saving throw.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 120 feet, allowing it to detect hidden creatures and see through illusions.
skills: Has a strong insight and intimidation skill, making it adept at manipulating situations.
additional_information: Immunity to poison damage and the poisoned condition.
Resistance to cold, fire, and lightning damage.
Ability to communicate telepathically up to 120 feet.
Multiattack allows it to strike with a whip and axe in the same turn.
Weeping Acid ability damages those who touch it or attack it in melee.
test_queries: huge fiend that inflicts acid damage
chaotic fiend that controls the battlefield
